text: <!channel> for those of you who I invited to the Copy kickoff tomorrow  - we’re going to make it an introductory meeting rather than a work session. So to that point, I think all we definitely need there is <@U0HPGQ4KH> and <@U0265G76F>. The rest of you on the invite, please consider yourself optional.
(I can’t remove you from the invite since I didn’t create it, hence the announcement)
